title: How can I use Resulon for free?
text: You can use Resulon for free during the 7-day trial period. During this period, you have unrestricted access to all of the features, which include the resume and cover letter builders, task recommendations, skill suggestions, and customizable templates. To begin your free trial, simply sign up for the service.

title: Can I change or cancel my plan?
text: Yes, you have the flexibility to change or cancel your plan at any time. To do this, you can go into your account settings or reach out to the Resulon support team who will guide you through the process.

title: Is there a difference in features for each plan?
text: No, there are no differences in features between plans. Resulon ensures that all users, regardless of their subscription plan, have full access to its comprehensive features. This includes the ability to create resumes and cover letters, receive personalized recommendations, and fully customize templates to fit individual preferences.
